name: Poppy Kart
description:
Poppy kart is a funny karting game in a pixelated world. Mario Kart fans (SMK-Super Nintendo) will love the world of Poppy Kart.

The story: Froggy, the Daddy Crapo's daughter ran away. You must collect totems to find her.

Here is what you have to do to unlock the races:
- Collect totems placed on the road
- Collect coins
- Finish at least 4th

Travel, fight and drive as fast as you can on 29 handcrafted crazy races.
You can unlock 7 characters by completing the bonus races. Help yourself by using weapons and finding the shortcuts.
Enjoy the retro soundtrack.
